comments:
Description:
   The column name including the double quotation marks in the dataset, when add a filter on the column on the layout, there is an error.


Steps to reproduce:
  1. download the attached flatfile 
  2. create a dataset(dataset_A) based on the flat file, set the unicode as 'UTF_8'
  3. drag the dataset to the layout, add a filter row["??\"?q\" \' \"#\"??"] equal to "SigniSpecialists Corp."
  4. save and preview

Actual result:
   Error0 : data.engine.BirtException ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: A BIRT exception occurred: Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: missing ] in index expression Script source: ROM Expression, line: 0, text:row["??"?q" ' "#"??"]. See next exception for more information.Error evaluating Javascript expression.
